ProductInfo.Features:
Image Sensor: 1/3 Sony CCD Camera Sensor,CDS Sensor. Horizontal Resolution: 420 TV Lines. Signal System: PAL. Effective Pixels: 752 (H) x 582 (V).
This Bullet Weatherproof Security Camera Can Be Used As One Component of Surveillance Systems in House, Hotel, Large Square, Road, etc. Various Occasions.
IP66 Waterproof Level, No Audio, 6mm Lens for Wide View Angle, BNC Connection, DC 12V 1000MA Regulated Power Supply.
The Distributed 5mm Diametrical 850nm Wavelength 36 pcs Infrared LEDs, Makes It Have Good Night Vision Up to 60 - 90 Feet.
Black Color, Auto White Balance, Internal Sync Speed, Back light Compensation.
ProductInfo.Name: BW® Black Housing 420 TVL 1/3" Sony CCD Colorful Night Vision Indoor / Outdoor Bullet CCTV Security Camera, 36PCS IR LEDs Video Surveillance System Camera Support 30m View Distance, IP66 Waterproof Level
